/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, mostly made of brick, exhibit a traditional Chinese architectural style, characterized by their curved roofs and ornate details. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a fish-eye perspective, which adds a unique distortion to the buildings and trees, enhancing the sense of depth and scale in the image.
